name: Blackbird
ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 dead player: they regain their ability (if necessary, causing it to function twice.)

name: Cardinal
ability: When you learn that you died, tonight you learn how many of your 2 living neighbors are evil.

name: Dove
ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: for 3 nights (starting tonight) they are safe from the Demon.

name: Finch
ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: that night, you learn their character.

name: Jay
ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 player: that night, they learn who you are.

name: Magpie
ability: If you die at night, you are woken to choose 2 players: you learn 2 characters (but not which is which.)

name: Raven
ability: When you learn that you died, tonight you learn how many steps between you and the nearest living evil player.

name: Robin
ability: If you die at night, you live but register as dead.

name: Sparrow
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are Evil, they die. If not, you do.

name: Starling
ability: If you die at night, you learn 2 players, at least one of whom is evil.

name: Thrush
ability: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is good, they die tonight.

name: Vireo
ability: If you die at night, you learn one evil character in play.

name: Warbler
ability: If you are executed, tonight you learn how many dead players are good. If you die at night, you learn how many dead players are evil.

name: Grackle
ability: Each night, you or one of your Townsfolk neighbors become drunk until tomorrow night. [-1 Outsider]

name: Junco
ability: If you are executed, tonight you are woken to choose a player: if good, they die.

name: Mallard
ability: Each night, if no Townsfolk said ‘quack’ today, a player might die. If you are "mad" about being the Mallard, someone might be executed.

name: Osprey
ability: A player might die at any time.

name: Eagle
ability: You might register as good or a Townsfolk. You start knowing the character of one of your neighbors (and which neighbor specifically.) [+1 Outsider]

name: Falcon
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their character.

name: Kite
ability: When you learn that you die, publicly choose a player: they are poisoned for the rest of the game, even if you are dead.

name: Shrike
ability: When you learn that you die, publicly choose a player: they die tonight.

name: Hawk
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. When you learn that you die, publicly choose a player: if they are the Raven, your team wins instead. [+the Raven]

name: Kestrel
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Once per game, choose an additional player: they become evil.

name: Owl
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If an evil character died today, choose an additional player: you learn their character.

name: Vulture
ability: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. Otherwise, choose a player: they are poisoned until dusk tomorrow.

name: Bird Calls
ability: Players making public declarations are not required to openly specify as what character they are declaring.
